title: SOLD: T205 Tinker, Evers, Chance SGC...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: SOLD: T205 Tinker, Evers, Chance SGC...
posts.post_content:
For sale, a trio of T205s depicting the Chicago Cubs HOFers, Joe Tinker, Johnny Evers, and Frank Chance.  Nicely centered cards with great eye appeal.

$SOLD net to me, postpaid in the continental U.S. Tax free. :o

Commitment to purchase supercedes any ongoing negotiation.  :rolleyes:

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]https://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]
Sorry Ryan, they have been claimed.  You guys are quick!
Wow that was quick. Damn it. Thanks anyway.
